text: Al-Kahf (Arabic: سورة الكهف) is the 18th surah of the Qur'an, the religious book of Muslims. It has 110 verses and 12 ruku's. Surah Al-Kahf has been revealed in Makkah . In this Surah, three questions of the Quraysh have been answered. In this Surah the story of Prophet Moses and Prophet Khizr has also been narrated. == References == == Other websites == * Q18:51, 50+ translations, islamawakened.com * * Quran 18 Clear Quran translation * Surah Kahf by Sudais Category:Chapters in the Quran
title: Surah Al-Kahf
